title: Manage a Call for Offers Process
description: For a high-demand investment property, an agent manages a formal 'call for offers' process with a specific deadline.

tasks.description: Distribute the Offering Memorandum and set a firm deadline for all offers to be submitted.
tasks.expected_outcome: All potential buyers are notified of the offer deadline.

tasks.description: Receive and log all offers as they are submitted, ensuring they are complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: All submitted offers are organized and time-stamped.

tasks.description: After the deadline, create a summary of all offers for the seller and schedule a meeting to review them and select the best one.
tasks.expected_outcome: The seller is presented with a clear comparison of all offers to make an informed decision.
